summary: CompareSlotHeader was redesigned with a top “Option {slotNumber}” outlined banner using distinct border colors per slot, and the second line now lays out date + clock-icon variance badge + inline “Change” button with wrapping support. Two non-requested metadata/state files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Always show a compact clock-icon day-variance indicator inline next to the date (with the variance value secondary/tooltip), for each compare slot header.
missing_requirements.reason: In the updated header, the variance indicator only renders when `variance !== null`. If `variance` can be null for any slot state, the UI would omit the variance indicator entirely, which may violate the requirement/AC that the second line shows the variance indicator inline next to the date.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained repository metadata/state summaries unrelated to the requested header UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a header presentation redesign; it does not request updates to project summary/state files.
